title: EchoLux
desp: Echolux is a web design for my final project during my internship with Creative Bananas. Finishing this project will mark as the end of our internship in Creative Bananas.

title: ElevateFit
desp: Elevate is a web design project during my internship with Creative Bananas. The task is to create a web design for a particular field, and my chosen field is about fitness.

title: Grab
desp: Grab web design is also one of my projects during my intership with Creative Bananas. The task involves creating a web design for existing local business.

title: SweatSync
desp: SweatSync is a UI/UX project during my internship with Creative Bananas. The task is to let us experience the process of creating a design for apps

title: TravelAgency
desp: Travel Juan is my very first project during my internship with Creative Bananas. It involves creating a brand with brand book, business card and at the same time promoting it using web design.

title: Roomly
desp: Roomly is a web design project and my attempt to create an e-commerce website. This is the initial design that later will be turned into an e-commerce website.

title: PartyBuilderz
desp: PartyBuilderz is a school project web design made to showcase our fictional business. We were tasked to create a business and showcase it in IT way.

title: Document Converter
desp: Document Converter is my personal web design project. It’s my very first project that i’ve worked on. I made this because i want to explore the capabilities of figma.

title: Fitplan
desp: FitPlan is a web application designed to help gym enthusiasts create custom workout routines with detailed information about each exercise

title: SeaFood
desp: The SeaFood South East Asian Food Catalog is a web application that showcases a variety of traditional and popular seafood dishes from Southeast Asia.

title: Yecipes
desp: Yecipes is a web application dedicated to promoting healthy vegetarian eating. It features a curated catalog of vegetarian recipes with detailed information about the dish.
